etymologies: late Middle English: apparently representing an Old English word from the Germanic root of wax

definitions: the part of the human body below the ribs and above the hips.
shortDefinitions: part of human body below ribs and above hips

definitions: the circumference of a person's waist
a narrowing of the trunk of the body above the hips

examples.text: the last time you had a waist was around 1978

shortDefinitions: narrowing of trunk of body at this point

definitions: the part of a garment encircling or covering the waist.
shortDefinitions: part of garment encircling or covering waist

definitions: the point at which a garment is shaped so as to narrow between the rib cage and the hips

examples.text: a jacket with a high waist

shortDefinitions: point at which garment is shaped so as to narrow between rib cage and hips

definitions: a narrow part in the middle of anything, such as a violin, an hourglass, the body of wasp, etc.
shortDefinitions: narrow part in middle of anything, such as violin, hourglass, body of wasp

definitions: the middle part of a ship, between the forecastle and the quarterdeck.
shortDefinitions: middle part of ship, between forecastle and quarterdeck
